item.description: Welcome to my website. I am an Predoc with STICERD at the LSE, working with Robin Burgess and Oriana Bandiera. I am interested in political economy and development economics, and have previously worked on conflict and political reservations in India, democratic transitions and state repression, and longevity. I plan to start a PhD in Economics in Fall 2021. Curriculum Vitae (Version November 2020) Low level conflict in india
